Actions.Name: Steal Skill
Actions.Description: The Hob chooses a foe in range 3. Until the end of that foe's next turn, they treat all foes as having evasion and dodge.

Actions.Name: Lost Object
Actions.Description: The Hob produces and throws a lost object at a foe in range 4. Roll 1d6.

Rolls.Name: Kettle Full of Tea
Rolls.Description: Hot tea inflicts [fray] damage, burning and blinded.

Rolls.Name: Portable Hole
Rolls.Description: Create a pit under the foe.

Rolls.Name: Old Sandwich
Rolls.Description: Foe is slowed and poisoned, then must save or lose all vigor.

Rolls.Name: Bag of Hammers
Rolls.Description: Foe must save or take 3 damage five times, or just once on a successful save.
